lines: !throw You are not a registered player! Please use `!e new_game` first.
!throw You cannot craft anything in the middle of battle.
!if {!tag {me} inv_{!data craft {id} meta cost_item_{i}}} < {!data craft {id} meta cost_amount_{i}}
!say {!data craft {id} params item} | {!data craft {id} params cost}
